        public Person loadUserByUsername(java.lang.String username)
                          throws org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException
        Returns a populated UserDetails object. The username is first retrieved from the database and then mapped to a UserDetails object. We are currently using the User implementation from Spring
